description.short: Daily challenge bot - who can guess the daily image from round the world
description.full: Every day at 08:45, the Bot will ask the Team to pick either one of the Bing background pictures from the seven different counties available or it will select a random place from Google and choose a photo from there. Then, each team member has until 16:00 that day to guess where in the world the photo is. Once either all the people have guessed or it's 16:00, then the Bot will work out who was closest.

commands.description: Select this to start the challenge if not already triggered today

commands.description: Select this to trigger the checking of results but try not to do this before everyone has answered
